label.description: label of the invoice to be deleted

status.description: label of the invoice to be deleted. The caller should be particularly aware of the error case caused by the *status* changing just before this command is invoked!

desconly.description: if set to True, the invoice is not deleted, but has its description removed (this can save space with very large descriptions, as would be used with lightning-invoice(7) *deschashonly*
